SELECT COUNT(1) retCnt FROM T_TRAN_RECEIPT TR WHERE TR.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ((TR.FR_CUST_ID = #{loginCustId} AND TR.FR_DEPT_ID = #{mngDeptId}) OR (TR.TO_CUST_ID = #{loginCustId} AND TR.TO_DEPT_ID = #{mngDeptId}))
AND CONVERT(CHAR(10), TR.REGDATE, 23) BETWEEN #{fromDate} AND #{toDate}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TRD.RECEIPT_SEQ DESC) AS number, TRD.ORDER_ID orderId, TRD.ALLOC_ID allocId, TRD.RECEIPT_ID receiptId, TRD.CALC_ID calcId, TRD.RECEIPT_SEQ receiptSeq, (SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(10), ALLOC_DATE, 23) FROM T_ORDER_ALLOC WHERE ALLOC_ID = TRD.ALLOC_ID) allocDate, O.S_SIDO + ' ' + O.S_GUNGU sComName, O.E_SIDO + ' ' + O.E_GUNGU eComName, O.GOODS_NAME goodsName, CONVERT(FLOAT,O.GOODS_WEIGHT)/1000 goodsWeight, O.GOODS_QTY goodsQty, (SELECT CNAME FROM T_CODE WHERE GCODE = 'WGT_UNIT_CD' AND CODE = O.WEIGHT_UNIT_CODE) weightUnitCode, ISNULL((SELECT CNAME FROM T_CODE WHERE GCODE = 'QTY_UNIT_CD' AND CODE = O.QTY_UNIT_CODE),'') qtyUnitCode, FORMAT(ISNULL(TRD.ALLOC_CHARGE, 0), '##,##0') allocCharge, FORMAT(ISNULL(TRD.ALLOC_VAT, 0), '##,##0') allocVat, FORMAT(ISNULL(TRD.ALLOC_AMT, 0), '##,##0') allocAmt, TRD.MEMO memo,
ISNULL((SELECT CAR_NUM FROM T_ORDER_ALLOC OA WHERE TRD.ORDER_ID = OA.ORDER_ID AND ISNULL(OA.VEHIC_ID, '') != ''), '') carNum FROM T_TRAN_RECEIPT_DTL TRD, T_ORDER O WHERE TRD.ORDER_ID = O.ORDER_ID AND RECEIPT_ID = #{receiptId}

SELECT RECEIPT_ID receiptId, TO_CUST_ID toCustId, CASE WHEN TO_DEPT_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE TO_DEPT_ID END toDeptId , FR_CUST_ID frCustId, CASE WHEN FR_DEPT_ID IS NULL THEN '' ELSE FR_DEPT_ID END frDeptId, left(FR_BIZ_NUM,3)+'-'+substring(FR_BIZ_NUM,4,2)+'-'+substring(FR_BIZ_NUM,6,len(FR_BIZ_NUM)) ftBizNum, CASE WHEN FR_BIZ_NUM_SUB = '0000' THEN '' ELSE FR_BIZ_NUM_SUB END frBizNumSub, FR_BIZ_NAME frBizName, FR_CEO frCeo, CASE WHEN FR_TELNUM IS NULL THEN '' ELSE FR_TELNUM END frTelNum, FR_BIZ_COND frBizCond, FR_BIZ_KIND frBizKind, FR_ADDR frAddr, FR_ADDR_DETAIL frAddrDetail, left(TO_BIZ_NUM,3)+'-'+substring(TO_BIZ_NUM,4,2)+'-'+substring(TO_BIZ_NUM,6,len(TO_BIZ_NUM)) toBizNum, CASE WHEN TO_BIZ_NUM_SUB = '0000' THEN '' ELSE TO_BIZ_NUM_SUB END toBizNumSub, TO_BIZ_NAME toBizName, TO_CEO toCeo, TO_TELNUM toTelNum, TO_BIZ_COND toBizCond, TO_BIZ_KIND toBizKind, TO_ADDR toAddr, TO_ADDR_DETAIL toAddrDetail, FORMAT(ISNULL(CHARGE, 0), '##,##0') charge, FORMAT(ISNULL(VAT, 0), '##,##0') vat, FORMAT(ISNULL(AMT, 0), '##,##0') amt, TRAN_S_DATE tranSDate, TRAN_E_DATE tranEDate, REGDATE regDate, REGID regId, USE_YN useYn FROM T_TRAN_RECEIPT WHERE RECEIPT_ID = #{receiptId} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
